comments.description: After a busy day, your pet will help you relax :)
comments.available: Even if you are a president, you can still enrich your life $$

comments.description2: Although, maybe not everyone will understand ...
comments.description22: But for you and your dog are good and fun - and this is the main thing!
comments.available2: Let the ill-wishers envy, but the friends are having fun with you :)
